translatePage.heading: Hello word
translatePage.sub-heading: This is a test to help understand nesting

hero.p: At our yoga studio, we're not your typical pretzel-twisting, 'Om'-chanting bunch. We're all about infusing your yoga journey with a big dose of FUN, a sprinkle of QUIRKY, and a heap of ZEN.

body.bendP: Bend, Breathe, Blossom. Our experienced instructors make yoga accessible and enjoyable for all levels
body.matP: We're not your typical pretzel-twisting 'Om'-chanting bunch. We're all about infusing your yoga journey with a big dose of FUN, a sprinkle of QUIRKY, and a heap of ZEN.
body.scheduleP: Timetable to Tingle Your Chakras: Our flexible schedule offers classes to fit every flow, from sunrise salutations to evening tranquility.
body.tribeP: Community That Lifts You Up: Join our yoga tribe and become part of a supportive, like-minded community that celebrates your journey.
body.tourP: Space to Find Your Inner Peace: Our cozy, chic studio nestled in the heart of Stockholm is a haven for relaxation, away from the city's hustle and bustle
body.flexP: Flex, Inhale, Flourish. Our seasoned instructors ensure yoga is accessible and delightful for all practitioners

card1.text: Start your day with tranquility as you greet the morning sun. Our Sunrise Salutations event is a revitalizing yoga session that energizes your body and spirit.

card2.text: Celebrate the magic of the full moon with a mesmerizing yoga flow. Join us to connect with lunar energy and find your balance under the moon's gentle glow.

card3.text: Treat yourself to a delightful combination of yoga and brunch. Nourish your body and soul with a morning of wellness followed by a scrumptious meal.

card4.text: Get your heart pumping and your spirits soaring in our Zen & Zumba Fusion event. Experience a lively blend of yoga and high-energy dance moves for a fun-filled workout.

card5.text: Unleash your inner child (and your furry friends) in our Puppy Pose Party. Bring your four-legged companions for a heartwarming yoga session filled with playful poses.

card6.text: Take a deep dive into serenity with our Meditation & Mindfulness Retreat. Explore the art of inner peace through guided meditation and mindfulness practices.

card7.text: Step into a world of enchantment with Glowga. Practice yoga beneath the starry night sky while your body and surroundings illuminate, creating a magical experience.

card8.header: Yogis' Night Out Live Music & Laughter
card8.text: Get ready for a night of harmony, laughter, and vibrant energy. Our Yogis' Night Out features live music, stand-up comedy, and a joyful yoga session.

card9.text: Start your day with tranquility as you greet the morning sun. Our Sunrise Salutations event is a revitalizing yoga session that energizes your body and spirit.

eventsBottom.text: Flex, Inhale, Flourish. Our seasoned instructors ensure yoga is accessible and delightful for all practitioners
